articles.description: Sujeet Kalkal, co-petitioner against exemption from Asian Games trials given to Bajrang and Vinesh, loses 65kg semis, fellow dissenter Vishal Kaliraman wins
articles.content: His right eye swollen by an impact injury, his lower lip chipped and his cauliflower ears scarred, winner Vishal Kaliraman was battered and bruised by the time the final whistle was blown. That thoug… [+4177 chars]

articles.author: Laurence Edmondson
articles.title: Norris damages Verstappen's Hungarian GP trophy during podium celebration - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Lando Norris accidentally broke Max Verstappen's winner's trophy at the Hungarian Grand Prix after some overexuberant celebrations on the podium.
articles.content:
BUDAPEST, Hungary -- Lando Norris broke Max Verstappen's winner's trophy at the Hungarian Grand Prix after knocking it off the top step of the podium while celebrating.
Verstappen won Sunday's race … [+1180 chars]
